short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically inserts Destiny's YouTube livestream into the DGG Bigscreen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience on destiny.gg/bigscreen by automatically embedding the latest YouTube live stream from the Destiny channel.
